attributes.action: Petition to stop Thatcher's funeral being paid by tax payer money
attributes.additional_details: This petition is designed to bring forth the dismay shared by many at the payment of Thatcher's funeral from tax payers coffers; I propose a counter argument that those who feel she deserves this £10million send off should finance it between themselves, and not to financially bog down to tax payers collectively who are largely against such actions.
